resources.string: This app sets up a bootless temporary root with Magisk on MediaTek Android devices.\n It uses mtk-su, the temporary root tool for MediaTek ARMv7 and ARMv8 chips.
WARNING: DO NOT UPDATE MAGISK THROUGH MAGISK MANAGER ON A LOCKED BOOTLOADER OR YOU WILL BRICK YOUR DEVICE
Created by Jeovane Santos\n Thanks to Diplomatic for writing the main script.
